Title: Otaku no Seiza
Description: ['Anime based on Otaku no Seiza: in Another World, on the Turbo CD, and Otaku no Seiza: An Adventure in the Otaku Galaxy, for the NES, which were two Role-Playing games, published by M&M, released in Japan in 1991 and 1993.']
Voices: ['Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Kikuchi, Masami', 'Genda, Tesshou', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Tanaka, Nobuo', 'Shinohara, Emi', 'Takada, Yumi', 'Hiramatsu, Akiko']
Staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', 'Sound Director'], ['Nishimori, Akira', 'Episode Director'], ['Eguchi, Hisashi', 'Original Creator'], ['Motomiya, Hiroshi', 'Original Creator']]
